title: Five fit fellows
brief_description: Gymnastic youngsters bound through a regime of physical health and fitness. An instructional film promoting an ideal of rigorous physical culture demonstrating a number of acrobatic manouvers.
description: Gymnastic youngsters bound through a regime of physical health and fitness. An instructional film promoting an ideal of rigorous physical culture demonstrating a number of acrobatic manouvers.
